scripts.build:cs: cd customer-support && yarn && yarn build && mkdir -p ../docs/customer-support && mv build/* ../docs/customer-support
scripts.build:sm: cd social-messenger-ts && yarn && yarn build && mkdir -p ../docs/social-messenger && mv build/* ../docs/social-messenger
scripts.build:ve: cd virtual-event-old && yarn && yarn build && mkdir -p ../docs/virtual-event && mv build/* ../docs/virtual-event
scripts.build:ve2: cd virtual-event && yarn && yarn build && mkdir -p ../docs/virtual-event-v2 && mv build/* ../docs/virtual-event-v2
scripts.build:t: cd team-ts && yarn && yarn build && mkdir -p ../docs/team && mv build/* ../docs/team
scripts.build:gl: cd gaming-livestream && yarn && yarn build && mkdir -p ../docs/gaming-livestream && mv build/* ../docs/gaming-livestream
scripts.build:js: rm -rf ./docs && yarn build:cs && yarn build:sm && yarn build:ve && yarn build:t && yarn build:gl && yarn build:ve2
scripts.build:js:public: rm -rf ./docs && yarn build:sm && yarn build:t && yarn build:gl && yarn build:ve2
scripts.upgrade:gaming-livestream: cd gaming-livestream && yarn add stream-chat-react stream-chat
scripts.upgrade:social-messenger-ts: cd social-messenger-ts && yarn add stream-chat-react stream-chat
scripts.upgrade:team-ts: cd team-ts && yarn add stream-chat-react stream-chat
scripts.upgrade:virtual-event: cd virtual-event && yarn add stream-chat-react stream-chat
